data.title: Hand-picked Sneakers Web Development
data.brief: A sneark sharing platform called showTaste
works: Built a RESTful API with Node.js, deployed the server with Heroku and databases with Mongo Atlas
Completed authentication/authorization using passport and middleware, CRUD and search function, encouraged users to post their sneaker and commented otherâ€™s posts
Design database relationship diagrams for sneaker and user management, stored raw information data using Moogoose

data.title: Augmented Reality (AR) Survey on AR Development Tools
data.brief: Summarized and categorized AR capabilities, hardware, and software development tools
data.character: Research Assistant instructed by Prof. Ranjitha Kumar
works: Summarized and categorized AR capabilities, hardware, and software development tools including Hololens2, ARKit, etc.
Built a website called StarMap using styled-components in React.js to suggest development tools for AR programmers
Cleaned the test data of AR applications in CSV files and converted to JSON form with Python as the website data sets
